statements: DELETE FROM Customer WHERE name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM Customer WHERE id = 1 AND name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM travel_itineraries WHERE destination = 'Paris' AND departure_date < '2022-12-31';
DELETE FROM bookings WHERE booking_date < '2022-01-01' AND total_price > 1000;
DELETE FROM itineraries WHERE end_date < '2022-12-31' OR start_date >= '2023-01-01';
DELETE FROM travel_itineraries WHERE customer_id = 1001 AND destination = 'Paris';
DELETE FROM Payment WHERE payment_amount > 1000 AND payment_date < '2022-01-01';
